channel.title: How to make a npc not attack
channel.description: Hey guys im using Summon-Pkz V2 the server source and theres jad out in the wild, I was wondering if anyone knows how to make it so it doesnt attack. Also I was wondering if anyone has the client so the items in the shops are not nulled, If not then thats fine by me, Ill just have to add in the models which is a big pain in the ass. Anyways, Thanks!

item.title: How to make a npc not attack
item.dc:creator: @lolipwn lolipwn
item.description:
@lolipwn wrote:

Alright how do i get rid of them?I tryed what marcbob told me to do but it didnt work out very well… Jad still attacks, and I dont know how to remove the nulls from the shops because I cannot tell the difference between the nulled items and the regular ones.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc not attack

item.title: How to make a npc not attack
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

npchandler for agressive.

For nulls youll have to add the models to get rid of them but iwould just remove the nulls from your shop

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc not attack

item.title: How to make a npc not attack

item.description:
@lolipwn wrote:

Which File, I know what npc it is, it’s Jad but I want him to not be able to attack when players are attacking him.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a npc not attack
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

search ur files with the “ID” of the npc because that will be most likely used to make it agressive
